lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But Zambia's decision to abandon last May 1 a tough International Monetary Fund (IMF) economic recovery program has introduced an element of uncertainty into plans to restructure the ailing industry and boost profitability, they said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We are still consulting to see how the new measures will affect us but it is too early to say just how we shall fare under the new situation," Peter Hansen, director of operations and third in the ZCCM hierarchy, told Reuters.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Most specialists I have talked to tell me the break-even point for ZCCM is a rate of 10 kwacha per dollar," Frederick Chiluba, leader of the Zambian Congress of Trade Unions said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Most specialists I have talked to tell me the break-even point for ZCCM is a rate of 10 kwacha per dollar," Frederick Chiluba, leader of the Zambian Congress of Trade Unions said.
